segments.text: Did you watch TV last night , Rose ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yeah . I saw a science program . It was quite interesting .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Mars . Scientists say there might be water on it .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: If so , we may live there someday .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I hope so . Did you know the US successfully sent two robotic explorers to Mars last month ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Sure . I heard about this on the TV . On January 3rd , 2004 , Explorer Spirit landed near the so-called Guser Crater . And three weeks later , Spirit's twin explorer , Opportunity , landed on Meridian Planum named by scientists .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes . Both have sent back pictures of the planet . And the latter did a better job .
segments.speaker: S2
